tool.name: SAGA.grid_tools.12
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False isArrayIDENTITY False isArrayRANGE False isArrayGRID False output_data_OUTPUT $output_data_OUTPUT name SAGA.grid_tools.12 INPUT $INPUT METHOD $METHOD IDENTITY $IDENTITY RANGE $RANGE GRID $GRID prefer $prefer response $response outputType_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.outputType_OUTPUT transmissionMode_OUTPUT $OutputSection_OUTPUT.transmissionMode_OUTPUT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Grid
param.help: Grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: IDENTITY
param.label: Lookup Table
param.help: Lookup Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: RANGE
param.label: Lookup Table
param.help: Lookup Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: GRID
param.label: Grid Classification
param.help: Synchronize with look-up table classification of another grid (gui only). The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_OUTPUT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_OUTPUT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Changes values of a grid according to the rules of a user defined lookup table. Values or value ranges that are not listed in the lookup table remain unchanged. If the target is not set, the changes will be stored to the original grid.
